Class playn.core.Image

Added interface playn.core.Canvas.Drawable.

Changed from an interface to a class.

Removed Methods
void addCallback(Callback<Image>) Adds a callback to be notified when this image has loaded.
void clearTexture() Clears the GPU texture associated with this image, on platforms implemented via OpenGL.
int ensureTexture() Creates a texture for this image (if one does not already exist) and returns its OpenGL texture id.
boolean isReady() Whether or not this image is ready to be used.
boolean repeatX() Returns whether this image repeats in the x direction.
boolean repeatY() Returns whether this image repeats in the y direction.
void setMipmapped(boolean) Configures the use of mipmaps when rendering this image at scales less than 1.
void setRepeat(boolean, boolean) Configures whether this image repeats in the x or y direction (rather than scaling) when used in a layer whose width or height is larger or smaller than the image.
Region subImage(float, float, float, float) Returns an image that draws the specified sub-region of this image.
Pattern toPattern() Creates a Pattern that can be used to use this image as a fill in a canvas.
 

Added Methods
Pattern createPattern(boolean, boolean) Creates a pattern from this image which can be used to fill a canvas.
Texture createTexture(Config) Creates a texture with this image's bitmap data using {@code config}.
boolean isLoaded() Returns whether this image is fully loaded.
int pixelHeight() Returns the height of this image in physical pixels.
int pixelWidth() Returns the width of this image in physical pixels.
Region region(float, float, float, float) Returns a region of this image which can be drawn independently.
Image setConfig(Config) Sets the texture config used when creating this image's default texture.
void setRgb(int, int, int, int, int[], int, int) Sets pixel data for a rectangular area of this image.
Texture texture() Returns, creating if necessary, this image's default texture.
RFuture<Texture> textureAsync() Returns a future which will deliver the default texture for this image once its loading has completed.
Tile tile()  
RFuture<Tile> tileAsync()  
Texture updateTexture() Updates this image's default texture with the current contents of the image, and returns the texture.
 

Changed Methods
float height() Changed from abstract to non-abstract. This image's height in display units.
Scale scale() Change in return type from playn.core.gl.Scale to playn.core.Scale.
 Returns the scale of resolution independent pixels to actual pixels for this image.
float width() Changed from abstract to non-abstract. This image's width in display units.
 

Added Fields
RFuture<Image> state Reports the asynchronous loading of this image.
